summary: Completed frontend testing of Ocean store pages. Found critical frontend-backend integration issues preventing login and product display despite working backend APIs.

critical_bugs.issue: Login form submission fails - stays on login page despite correct credentials (testbuyer@ocean.com/test123)
critical_bugs.impact: Users cannot authenticate, blocking all authenticated features
critical_bugs.details: Backend login API works correctly (returns token), but frontend doesn't handle response properly

critical_bugs.issue: Products page shows 'No products found' despite backend having 23 products
critical_bugs.impact: Core shopping functionality broken - users cannot browse products
critical_bugs.details: Backend products API returns 23 products correctly, frontend not displaying them
Form fills correctly but submission doesn't work

integration_issues.issue: Frontend not properly communicating with backend APIs
integration_issues.details: Backend APIs work correctly via curl, but frontend cannot consume them

passed_tests: Homepage loads with Ocean branding and hero section
Register page displays with buyer/seller selection options
Product detail page layout and quantity selector work
Cart page shows 'Please Log In' when not authenticated
Wishlist page shows 'Please Log In' when not authenticated
Checkout page shows 'Please Log In' when not authenticated

success_percentage.frontend: 30% - UI loads but core functionality broken due to API integration issues

action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix frontend-backend API integration. Backend APIs work correctly (verified via curl), but frontend cannot authenticate users or load products. Check API URL configuration, CORS settings, and error handling in frontend API calls. Priority: 1) Fix login authentication flow, 2) Fix products loading, 3) Fix registration flow.
